Key Match Events: David Peralta hit a two-run home run in the ninth inning
Brandon Lockridge hit a two-run home run in the ninth inning
Donovan Solano hit a two-run home run off Scott McGough
Pre-Game Insights: The D-backs had to win to keep their playoff hopes alive
A.J. Puk had been the most effective reliever in MLB for three full months
The D-backs had second and third with one out in the sixth inning but could not score
Randy Vasquez no-hit the D-backs for five innings before a Corbin Carroll leadoff double started the sixth
Post-Match Reflections: A.J. Puk said 'it's just one of those things, it's baseball, things happen like that'
Randy Vasquez said 'Gotta tip your hat', acknowledging the Padres' performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nick Ahmed made a spectacular diving stop on a smash down the third base line from Randal Grichuk
Ketel Marte made several outstanding plays to rob base hits
